Metadata.title: Idea2Posts - AI-Powered Thread Posting Automation Service
Metadata.description: AI saves you 90% of the time spent managing your threads. If you have a link or idea, we'll automatically generate optimized Thread posts for you.

og.title: Idea2Posts - AI-Powered Thread Management Automation
og.description: AI saves you 90% of the time spent managing your threads! Just share a content link. AI will automatically generate and schedule posts.

twitter.title: Idea2Posts - AI-Powered Thread Management Automation
twitter.description: AI saves you 90% of the time spent managing your threads! Just share a content link. AI will automatically generate and schedule posts.

Landing.title: Find Your Perfect Research Lab
Landing.description: Explore and compare top research labs worldwide based on their publications and impact in different fields of computer science.
Landing.cs_ranking_description: Comprehensive rankings of computer science research labs based on conference publications and citations.

features.feature1: Rankings based on top-tier conference publications
features.feature2: Detailed analysis of research impact by field

Landing.future_fields_description: We're working on expanding our coverage to more academic fields.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2024 World Lab Ranking. All rights reserved.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - World Lab Ranking
metadata.description: Privacy Policy for World Lab Ranking

dataCollection.title: Personal Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following personal information to provide our services:

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: The collected personal information is used for the following purposes:

dataSecurity.title: Data Protection
dataSecurity.content: We implement necessary technical and administrative measures to protect your personal information securely.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: We may use cookies to provide our services, and users can refuse cookie usage through their browser settings.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Disclosure
thirdParty.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about privacy protection, please contact us using the information below.

metadata.title: Terms of Service - World Lab Ranking
metadata.description: Terms of Service for World Lab Ranking

acceptance.title: Agreement to Terms
acceptance.content: By using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: World Lab Ranking is a service that analyzes and provides rankings of research institutions worldwide.

accounts.title: Account Management
accounts.content: Users are responsible for maintaining the accuracy and security of their account information.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Users must agree to relevant costs and payment terms when using paid services.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Withdrawal
cancellation.content: Users may terminate their account at any time if they wish to discontinue the service.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited when using the service:

items.illegal: Using the service for illegal purposes

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we strive for accuracy in the information provided, we do not guarantee the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of all information.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: These terms may be modified to reflect changes in laws or service updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about the Terms of Service, please contact us via email below.
